item.title: Mercedes-Benz GLS Maybach and a Tale of Two Friends!
item.description: India’s leading luxury car brand Mercedes-Benz today delivered a personally curated Mercedes-Maybach GLS 600 to Ms. Geeta Goradia, spouse of city-based business person, Amit Goradia. The luxury SUV was delivered to Ms. Geeta Goradia by Dr. Bharat Balasubramanian (Dr. B), Professor and Executive Director Center for Advanced Vehicle Technology at College of Engineering, University of Alabama, (also an Ex-Board member of Mercedes-Benz India & Chairman of Mercedes-Benz R&D India and former Vice President of Daimler Group Research and Advanced Engineering), in the presence of Martin Schwenk, Managing Director & CEO, Mercedes-Benz India.

item.title: Jawa 42 - "My Bike decides the destination" - Pavan C
item.description: We got an opportunity to meet and interview Mr Pavan C, an engineer based out of Bengaluru who owns the popular Jawa 42 motorcycle. Following are the transcript of our conversation with him. What made you buy the new Jawa 42 motorcycle? I always wanted to own a motorcycle with higher capacity engine and also the one which has got an appealing and retro design. I felt Jawa 42 is the right choice to make.

item.title: 2022 Ford Service Commitment Campaign
item.description: The digital (60Sec) and television spots (30 Sec) that follow, also convey Fordâ€™s Feels-Like- Family commitment message, using the power of emotional storytelling. The campaign film opens with the protagonist handing over the keys of her EcoSport to a Ford Service executive. The film then shows her looking at their sparingly used Ford Ikon and enquiring if the old Ikon can also be serviced, just to surprise her mother on her birthday.
